sense.name: Hamper the progress of something.
sense.examples: His advances short-circuited her warm feelings toward him. Their efforts short-circuited the military advance.

sense.name: Create an electrical short in something.
sense.examples: We accidentely short-circuited the computer. Be careful not to short-circuit the appliance.

sense.name: Avoid something unpleasant.
sense.commentary: Note: Compare to Sense 1; in this sense, something is avoided that is of personal consequence and emerging from or bearing on the subject.
sense.examples: You cannot short-circuit these rules! Campers are unable to short-circuit the code of ethics. I short-circuited thoughts of my father.
